thread.section_title: Gigantti arvostelut | Asiakkaiden arvostelut Gigantti | www.gigantti.fi
thread.title: Maria Gorbunova

author: Maria Gorbunova
title: Maria Gorbunova
text:
I had a problem with my shipping because of Christmas holidays, that is why I came to get my package earlier than I was supposed to.
Nevertheless, Gigantti has understood my situation (I came from another country ) and helped me to get my package at the same day !
Very helpful and understanding personnel, very fast and qualified service.
I strongly recommend Gigantti and will certainly come to this store again, but at the right day this time :)
